about: We're students of the "Zespół Szkół Łączności im. Obrońców Poczty Polskiej" in Gdansk. We have prepared the website for the competition: "Śladami Obrońców Westerplatte". The subject of the competition was interesting for us and we wanted to share our knowledge with others, so we decided to take part in it. The project took us 3 weeks in total
projectName: Page about the Defenders of Polish Post office in Gdansk
